meanings.sent1: The children whispered about the bogey hiding in the closet.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe in the existence of a bogey that causes trouble.
meanings.sent3: The storybook featured a friendly bogey who played pranks on the characters.
meanings.sent4: The old house was said to be haunted by a malevolent bogey.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the bogey as a sneaky creature with magical powers.

meanings.definition: A score of one stroke over par on a hole in golf
meanings.sent1: He was disappointed to get a bogey on the last hole of the game.
meanings.sent2: The golfer's final score included a bogey on the challenging hole.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, he couldn't avoid a bogey on the tricky course.
meanings.sent4: The bogey on the scorecard cost him the lead in the golf tournament.
meanings.sent5: The player's frustration grew with each bogey he recorded during the round.

meanings.definition: A piece of dried nasal mucus
meanings.sent1: She discreetly wiped away the bogey from her child's nose.
meanings.sent2: The tissue revealed a small bogey that had been bothering him.
meanings.sent3: The toddler proudly showed off the bogey he had picked from his nose.
meanings.sent4: The comedian joked about the embarrassing moment of having a visible bogey.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected sneeze resulted in a bogey landing on his shirt sleeve.
